msg.book: The status of {{label}}.eth will be rechecked in {{duration}}.
msg.register00: {{label}}.eth will be registered to {{owner}} for {{duration}} days.

register11.succeed: SETP 1 FINISHED: {{label}}.eth commit {{txLink}} confirmed, wait a short time before the next step.
register11.fail: {{label}}.eth COMMIT FAILED. You can check the commit {{txLink}}.

msg.register20: SETP 2 FINISHED: {{label}}.eth is ready for registration.

register30.succeed: SETP 3 FINISHED: {{label}}.eth register {{regTxLink}} COMPLETED with a {{donationValue}} ETH donation.
register30.fail: {{label}}.eth REGISTRATION FAILED. You can check the registration {{regTxLink}}.

setAndStoreNameInfo.succeed: Name information has been updated and stored.
setAndStoreNameInfo.fail: Failed to store the name information.

setAndStoreConfInfo.succeed: Configurations have been updated and stored.

modal.title: Need Confirmation
modal.reg: Are you sure to register {{label}}.eth? After the registration process has started, do not close this page until the registration is completed.
modal.regAll: Are you sure to register THESE ENS names?
modal.removeNames: Are you sure to CLEAR the table?
